name: Transparent Ask.fm Theme
description:
Render your Ask.fm in a special style with trasparent background! 
Rendi il tuo Ask.fm in uno speciale stile con background trasparente!
**RIMUOVE GLI ADS PUBBLICITARI!**
**REMOVES ADVERTISEMENTS!**
additional_info:
AUTHOR: Marco Bonelli - PASSIVELOVE.TK === CHANGELOG ===================================== VERSION 1.4 - 07/02/2014
  • Updated graphic interface of the profile and the new edit menu.
  • Changed name in "Transparent Ask.fm Theme".
VERSION 1.3.1 - 29/10/2013
  • Minor update: changed the style of new questions on the questions page, they're now highlighted with a smooth shadow.
VERSION 1.3 - 24/08/2013
  • Removed the Reccommended users box in the main page.
VERSION 1.2 - 11/08/2013
  • Removed the advertisements on top of the page!
VERSION 1.1 - 11/08/2013
  • Changed the color of the message/image boxes, now is black.
  • Fixed name color in the like box popout, now it's black and you can see it.
  • Setted default transparency to "Low", 70%.
  • Now the question from likes are marked with a red dot!
  • Fixed the color of the multiple ask box text. Now it's visible.
VERSION 1.0 - 11/08/2013
  • First version, release.
